CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar
it's the end of a long visit and Mot is a little impatient; most of Mot's contributions are of the sound it out variety , or she just gives the word that Chi is having trouble with

u.a: Chi talking to self a little
each syllable pronounced with exaggerated enunciation
MOT moves closer looks over Chi's shoulder
points to stomach ache and looks at Mot
